text: The Big Sleep is a 1946 American crime mystery movie directed by Howard Hawks and was based on the 1939 novel of the same name by Raymond Chandler. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, John Ridgely, Martha Vickers, Sonia Darrin, Dorothy Malone, Peggy Knudsen, Regis Toomey, Charles Waldron and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1946 mystery movies Category:1940s American crime movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks
title: The Big Sleep (1946 movie)
